forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East northeast wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
This morning, Downtown San Francisco greets the day with a crisp, clear sky and the promise of abundant sunlight. A light northeast breeze dances through the streets, bringing with it the invigorating chill that defines this season in the Bay Area. The temperature hovers around the low sixties, but expect it to dip into the upper fifties by afternoon, inviting you to dress in layers. An array of colors unfolds from the golden hues of distant hills to the deep blues of the bay, painting a backdrop that is unusually serene for this bustling city. 

As the sun begins its ascent, it washes the landscape in warmth, while the evening will be a gentle transition to cooler temperatures, wrapping the city in a soft embrace as night approaches. For those venturing outside today, a stroll along the Embarcadero or sipping coffee in one of the quieter parks would be delightful, allowing one to soak in both the invigorating air and the stunning views. The absence of fog today marks it as a rare jewel, revealing the Golden Gate Bridge in all its glory—a perfect invitation to delight in the natural beauty that surrounds us.
